Cosylab, Menlo Park CA

Cosylab is world leader in control systems for large physics projects. Our core expertise is system integration and providing solutions. We build control systems and provide instrumentation, specializing in particle accelerators of every kind (synchrotrons, colliders, spallation sources, of medical use for cancer treatment), fusion projects, such as ITER, or telescopes, such as ALMA. We are present in 5 of the 6 greatest physics projects in the world. We are searching for software/electrical engineers and physicists to join our team in California.

Open positions in Menlo Park, CA: FPGA and SW developer, more info: http://www.cosylab.com/job_opportunities/current_us_vacancie... Apply to jobs-us@cosylab.com

We are always looking for talented people to join our offices in Slovenia, China, Japan, Sweden or Switzerland. More info: http://www.cosylab.com/job_opportunities/current_vacancies/ Apply to jobs@cosylab.com
